description: This file defines an abstract interface and a concrete implementation for a notes repository using SQLite. It handles CRUD operations for Note objects, interfacing with a local database through the sqflite package.

classes.name: INotesRepository
classes.description: Abstract class defining CRUD operations for notes.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Concrete implementation of INotesRepository using SQLite via sqflite package.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database, returning a new Note with the assigned id.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by last updated date.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a note by its id, returns null if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns 0 if note has no id.
